attributes.contentHtml: I want to start a host, but I can't do it alone. Can anybody come make one with me?

Heya,

I came across this free host today and I just thought it was hilarious.

First off, the reason why this is marked illegal activity is because they admitted to not having a TOS when a member in the discord asked.

Also, their website (SummerHosting.org) is almost always down and was clearly made by someone under the age of 12:
They straight up say that your files might get lost which implies that they have had data losses in the past.

I believe that they are trying to pay for the nodes by putting ads on their website, although I can't confirm this as their site is down 99% of the time and I had my ad blocker on at the time, but I think this is the case because of this announcement he made:

Next up, their discord is set up terribly; They have #Welcome & #Goodbye channels although the main discord join messages are placed into the #main-chat. Also, within 10 minutes of me joining the discord, some random guy just @everyoned the whole server and the owner (Bxrk) demanded that he was hacking because he couldn't have possibly forgotten to remove the @everyone permission.

Also, I found this funny:

Discord: https://discord.gg/jvqZCyg3gk

Many hostings offer poor performance on their machines, offering prices too low for you to buy.
Right now I will give you some tricks to know what type of hosting you are dealing with.

TERMS OF SERVICE
When you have an organization or company it is necessary to have a section of terms of conditions where people can read the terms of your service and that they are aware of what is allowed and not, and of the policies, before buying in any hosting, check where they have their terms and conditions, it is necessary that their terms are published in some channel or web section so that the public can read them without problems, if your hosting does not have TOS avoid buying with them already that it is a company that does not take things seriously and when it comes to having a problem with them it will be more difficult to report them, if it is that if they have them it is necessary that you read them, if the hsoting does not respect with TOS at any time you can request a refund with PayPal or report them for Breach of terms and conditions towards customers.

*HOSTING QUALITY
In my personal opinion I recommend that before buying any hosting ask if their servers are hosted by them or resell any other service of a company, It is the obligation of the company that you are aware of where you are buying, almost all hostings resell Google Cloud or Azure machines, and it is not bad that they sell this type of machine while the user is aware of it, When buying ask them 'Do you have any website or app hosted in your hosting vps to view it ? ' If they pass you the ip of the machine or domain go to 'https://check-host.net/' go to info and scan the website and see if the website is hosted in google or other company, if it say cloudflare this method will not work.

WEB HOSTING
I will remind you of something so that you do not get confused by the hosting that say they offer 'unlimited space' it is not that it is a scam, just keep in mind that it is impossible to provide unlimited space and ram since logically it is not possible, I recommend you ask what is the ram limit that your web page can use, also keep in mind that a page hosted on a hosting is not a super heavy business page, since if it would a company website it will be hosted on a vps and not in a web hosting of '5 usd', Also whenever you buy, ask if the server is shared or dedicated, shared servers usually cost less than 5 usd for a lot of space, whereas dedicated ones cost more than 15 usd (In some hostings)

DO NOT MOVE FROM THE PLATFORM
If they are selling you a hosting for discord speak for discord, if they tell you to go to telegram or related apps tell them no, since discord will not be responsible if he is a scammer, I also recommend you always record the conversation to be able to Report on these types of forums to prevent others from being scammed.

PAYMENT
Remember that if the owner of the hosting asks you to pay him for 'Payment of friends and family' and he scams you, paypal will not be responsible if he scams you, and the guarantee og customer protection policy will not be activated, this is the same with bitcoins and cryptos, remember that cryptocurrencies do not have a backup bank for them so you will not have anyone to ask for your money back. Always pay by PayPal 'Payment of services'

DATA LEAK
You have to take into account that you have to be careful where you buy your website or vps, since the owner of the services will be able to see what you do inside and sometimes they abuse and can steal information from your users, Always buy in hostings that are verified, or that you see that they are trustworthy.

Take care of yourself ðŸ™‚
I hope it helps you

Hello

First of all let me introduce my self i recently started a small dev company and a free host with a friend. as it was my first time starting Businesses i made some Mistakes, the mistakes am gonna mention weren't totally mine but am here today to talk about me .

i have recently aquired the information that a thread is releasing about me here soon , so i thought, explaining myself before it comes out would be better, am not really sure what the thread is gonna talk about but here's the stuff i think i did wrong and how i solved them.

First of all Lets talk about the host (Genix-Host):
in genix me and the other founder did 2 mistakes :
1- The information about the node in the channel was wrong , i didn't really notice the mistake in the channel, as its a simple thing and there was no need re-checking it : the node had 10gb of ram
while in the node information channel it said it was 15GB this got fixed the moment i noticed it.
2- The rules: The rules were copied from another server , i didn't type the rules the other founder did, and it turned out later he didn't type it either he copied them from sway services, the minute i saw this i removed the old rules and added new one that i typed , he's explaining was "it was temporary",

which will bring us to the second sections my dev company its called atom dev and it also had 2 mistakes:

1- The Rules , this was before i realised genix rules were copied, so i took genix rules and used them for my dev company (atom development) , when the original owner of the rules informedme that it was his rules i changed them right after i changed genix rules.

2- Reselling a theme from ptero-dev : i managed to get a theme from someone for free , the person said he made it but i was sure it was from ptero-dev , i checked ptero-dev rules (they didnt have a tos ) and i found nothing that mentions reselling or getting it for free wasn't allowed so i put it for sale for a cheaper price, when the owners of the theme informed that they weren't okey with their themes getting resold, we took it down (we didn't take it down quitely we had a small argument but the argument was after we took it down)

another small thing for atom development (my dev ): we were going to start with 3 founders but when the 3rd founder was giving stolen templates and we suspected him with other stuff we demoted him this was before we started working on anything or do anything.

Again i apologize, i am not even sure if the thread is coming out but i wanted to explain my self anyways , if the thread comes out and i missed some stuff i will reply to that thread with explanation

I hope you guys understand this and forgive me and my colleagues.

ill answer any questions left below
So what happend was, blackkitten started to be really mean to sappy and literally made sappy cry. I forgot if hes staff or owner on a host, but I know hes at least staff.

Hello everybody, today i am here to point some things out when you're starting a free hosting or thinking of starting one..

Most free hostings fail, and thats mainly because of this. It cant run around. The only way you probably will get a free hosting big is being rich/kind of rich, to afford the nodes. Because if you dont have a contract with example google ads, (which you cant when you dont have enough traffic on the site) it will probably fail. Arc.io is NOT enough for running a free hosting.

Just wanted to point these things out, thank you for your time!

Hello everyone in drama.gg
It has come to my attention that someone named "Enmatt" has Hoaxed us (created an account to hoax us lmao)
Anyways
I would like for the admins of Drama.gg to delete/archive the hoax about my host

Here is some things I have improved/fixed.


  1. 1 reply: We're now getting a new TOS/Privacy Policy. Hand wrote to our company.

  2. 2 reply: doesn't really prove anything age related but when I first started hosting I needed a website for starter and someone offered me a website so he made him one (i forgot his discord as I forgot about it) 2 reply again: we ping @everyone to notify when a reset is going to occur we have had 0 data losses in the past.
  4. reply: I pay for nodes with the money I saved up before my host was a thing. We get some money from the customers purchasing products from us.
  6. reply: We fixed that, I was asking a simple question to the user if he can ping everyone. (we fixed all discord issues, everything is set up and ready)
  8. reply: he offered us a logo so I accepted it.

Pretty much the only valid thing in that thread is the TOS bit, although it was edited a tiny bit. (we're now getting a full valid tos for our company)

(ps: enmatt if something looks like a 12-year-old made it they're mostly not english...)

-------------------- start --------------------

Am fucking done with this twat so ima put all this on here
If anyone tries to bring up my thread here, fuck off this is puggos thread

-------------------- raiding, tokenlogging, nuking --------------------

Yesterday at like 1-2am, the shock discord got raided and we lost all the channels & roles + 200 members
Nyan in a gc with puggo and others asked them if they wanted admin in shock which ofc puggo said yes (very unusual for nyan)
Don't think anyone else got admin even tho they would have asked
The staff ofc handled it but 200 members were lost

Once i asked nyan about it later he said that mythical had sent him a "roblox hack" which tokenlogged him
In case no one knew this, nyan's pc has been broken for like 3 weeks now so that must have been complete bullshit

We then took nyan into a gc and guess wat?
Everything gets leaked to puggo somehow

(Nyan has no pc so how can he have a cursor? Also nyan was speaking a lot like puggo then)

Entire thing leaked to puggo

Later in the day (idk when) im pretty sure nyan got his acc back

Ig that's enough proof idk it's pretty obvious

-------------------- fake posts --------------------

-------------------- more --------------------

He started doing hosting in like feb 2021, I remember him back then and he didn't know shit about hosting

Prob made some mistakes in my typing bc autocorrect

Oh no another scamming discord server ay?

Firstly At Via - Here's why you don't trust people by giving you free nodes ;
I have been scammed by this discord server. After three days of being a investor on Raided Hosting helping out my friends. Then after ViaHost came alive and was dying a lot I came on their server and checked them out. They were absolutely horrible, really i'm not joking - theres even a winterhoax thread about it. A few days later when SceuGe joined, everything started growing on Via because he was giving free VPSs (16GB ram). Then I was a developer + administrator of it just to help them out a bit and tell them what they are doing wrong. When I was a developer on Via I was developing some sites like the main page and trying to make a client panel, when we announced it to the whole server that we are going to use it on ScueGe's nodes to host it on, ScueGe'd was so bothered about it that he literally copy all the files and use it for Host Horizon then shutting down the VPSs and the host had to be shut down.

At Horizon Hosting
Here we at, at Host Horizon. ScecuGe the main owner of Horizon seen my work on the other discord hosting guild, and wanted me to be staff. I did not want to participate with them as he didn't give me my files plus coding that I did on the other vpss for sites. After him keep saying for me to be a investor / executive, I said "NO" because since he is investing other hosts why not do it for yourself then??. It makes no sense at all. Why would he want me to invest his host that has a stolen src on their "not ready site". SceuGe said why do you not want to be part of the team.. I said it's because I do not trust you anymore. When I didn't want to be investing him and his host. A few days later, I had nothing to do except from maybe checking out some other hosts, and the only host I could check out was Horizon so I DM'd SecuGe'd again and said can I apply for the team this time? And he gave me the invite and gave me the roles (management and CFO & COO) straight away?? Still again why would anyone do that. It had 50 members so I was like I think I could help this host out by designing the channels and creating more information about the host.

Working at.. Host Horizon?
Okay yes, I still had nothing to do but the guy was pretty nice to me and I was the investor of their host.
I bought them a starter node (De1) which had 30GB of RAM from hetzner. His management team was very happy and the userbase was happy about it to - but the userbase didn't know about that it would be coming to a bad end. A few days later, just when I am offline - I've been pinged and notified to do many things that I didn't get paid for. They kept asking me to pay to daft (Co Owner of the host) when he said he is gonna pay me.

Heres Daft trying to force me to invest him something: http://prntscr.com/v7c5l1
Here's Daft trying to force me to give him money for a promotion?? : http://prntscr.com/v7c7z0

I also have been told to put the root password (ssh access) in the executive-only category section multiple times, so I did since I got it for the owners to invest. After me not noticing, they have figured out the password for my hetzner account. (the ssh password was the same as the hetzner cp acc). Guess what they did, shutting down the hetzner nodes and fake deleting the servers. Even though i didnt have access to the admin panel.. They kept blaming on me in announcements; http://prntscr.com/v7celh (22:13) , http://prntscr.com/v7cf61 (wtf) , http://prntscr.com/v7cfkc (sainty? Could it be him?) , http://prntscr.com/v7cg5z (Bad is a supporter for me for some reason) , http://prntscr.com/v7ch65 (MORE announcements information) ; I couldn't say much about them stealing arc money because I do not have much proof of them stealing arc money. http://prntscr.com/v7cisa (Screenshot of me saying that I have a backup since thats why i got a node backup) , http://prntscr.com/v7cjg9 (dms of me having no admin panel): http://prntscr.com/v7ckhl
And here's more of that ^ http://prntscr.com/v7ckq3 , http://prntscr.com/v7cl4s

Got my staff friend to be fake trusted - http://prntscr.com/v7clho
http://prntscr.com/v7cm4e - http://prntscr.com/v7cmja (eraters even banning him from all of our hosting servers, even no one is going up for scuege) http://prntscr.com/v7cnvd (my friend pretending to be on exe's side) After them saying that the hetzner account got suspended for suspicous activity ?? wut do they mean. http://prntscr.com/v7cogs , http://prntscr.com/v7cp5c (their sites got completely fcked up because one of their administrators that are on our teams leaked it for being scammers) http://prntscr.com/v7cpu1 (using my-licenses ). Trying to gain trust, http://prntscr.com/v7cq9x.

Here are the messages I sent for the group I made at first:
I sent this "Listen here, @Daftscientist you think I would do this cause of a destruction. Well would I do this? No. Because I dont give free nodes as bobkabab is sending dms of yours scuege. Bobkabab is saying that you are trying to say that I'm a scammer and no kind of a investor plus saying "I get why he is giving away free nodes" . Well no i do not give free nodes lmao i only do that if you are my friend and really want me to do some exe stuffl ike coding site. well actually i still want all my code back. Oreo,BobKabab and other staff are going to work me and eraters - a new host if i do not get accepted again. I still dont know why I got blamed firstly. Just because a no chargeback means you have to get angry just like me and remove all of my roles + banning ip from panel. I do not understand-"
He says "leave this.... daft leave? @ping"

And he says that i am trying to gain his trust again but I am not here's why:
http://prntscr.com/v7crvg - No gain trust part
http://prntscr.com/v7cs6k - Full messages part
I kinda hoped for him to not understand me...

**This is for the people who trust me*
Oh yea forgot to tell ya, they are doing everything without Private Policy and ToS they said from now on. ??????? I'm losing brain cells ok

attributes.question: Does the new discord brand suck?
